resources.string: This allows you to map MediaPortal functions to keys/buttons on your input devices. You could for example assign VolumeUp/Down to '+' and '-' on your keyboard if you don't have volume keys on your keyboard.
This allows you to map MediaPortal global actions to keys/buttons of your input device for quick access.
This allows you to map MediaPortal configuration and setup screens to keys/buttons of your input device for quick access.
This allows you to map MediaPortal menu screens to keys/buttons on your input device for quick access. For example you could define 'F2' on your keyboard to open the 'News' screen.
Press a key/button on the input device you would like to configure
Press the desired key/button combination on the input device!
All existing mappings will be overwritten. Do you want to continue?
